name: Marcelo S. Perlin
bio: Associate Professor of Finance at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS), Porto Alegre (Brazil), with a passion for quantitative finance and data science. My work focuses on developing and applying computational tools to solve real-world financial problems. I am the author of several books and research papers on data analysis, financial markets, and programming in R. I also develop and maintain open-source software in R and Python. For more details on my research and teaching, please see the Publications and Code sections.
